11#ifndef AUDIO_DEVICE_FILE_AUDIO_DEVICE_H_
12#define AUDIO_DEVICE_FILE_AUDIO_DEVICE_H_
13
14#include <stdio.h>
15
16#include <memory>
17#include <string>
18
19#include "modules/audio_device/audio_device_generic.h"
20#include "rtc_base/platform_thread.h"
21#include "rtc_base/synchronization/mutex.h"
22#include "rtc_base/system/file_wrapper.h"
23#include "rtc_base/time_utils.h"
24
25namespace webrtc {
26
27// This is a fake audio device which plays audio from a file as its microphone
28// and plays out into a file.
29class FileAudioDevice : public AudioDeviceGeneric {
30 public:
31 // Constructs a file audio device with |id|. It will read audio from
32 // |inputFilename| and record output audio to |outputFilename|.
33 //
34 // The input file should be a readable 48k stereo raw file, and the output
35 // file should point to a writable location. The output format will also be
36 // 48k stereo raw audio.
37 FileAudioDevice(const char* inputFilename, const char* outputFilename);
38 virtual ~FileAudioDevice();
39
40 // Retrieve the currently utilized audio layer
41 int32_t ActiveAudioLayer(
42 AudioDeviceModule::AudioLayer& audioLayer) const override;
43
44 // Main initializaton and termination
45 InitStatus Init() override;
46 int32_t Terminate() override;
47 bool Initialized() const override;
48
49 // Device enumeration
50 int16_t PlayoutDevices() override;
51 int16_t RecordingDevices() override;
52 int32_t PlayoutDeviceName(uint16_t index,
53 char name[kAdmMaxDeviceNameSize],
54 char guid[kAdmMaxGuidSize]) override;
55 int32_t RecordingDeviceName(uint16_t index,
56 char name[kAdmMaxDeviceNameSize],
57 char guid[kAdmMaxGuidSize]) override;
58
59 // Device selection
60 int32_t SetPlayoutDevice(uint16_t index) override;
61 int32_t SetPlayoutDevice(
62 AudioDeviceModule::WindowsDeviceType device) override;
63 int32_t SetRecordingDevice(uint16_t index) override;
64 int32_t SetRecordingDevice(
65 AudioDeviceModule::WindowsDeviceType device) override;
66
67 // Audio transport initialization
68 int32_t PlayoutIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
69 int32_t InitPlayout() override;
70 bool PlayoutIsInitialized() const override;
71 int32_t RecordingIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
72 int32_t InitRecording() override;
73 bool RecordingIsInitialized() const override;
74
75 // Audio transport control
76 int32_t StartPlayout() override;
77 int32_t StopPlayout() override;
78 bool Playing() const override;
79 int32_t StartRecording() override;
80 int32_t StopRecording() override;
81 bool Recording() const override;
82
83 // Audio mixer initialization
84 int32_t InitSpeaker() override;
85 bool SpeakerIsInitialized() const override;
86 int32_t InitMicrophone() override;
87 bool MicrophoneIsInitialized() const override;
88
89 // Speaker volume controls
90 int32_t SpeakerVolumeIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
91 int32_t SetSpeakerVolume(uint32_t volume) override;
92 int32_t SpeakerVolume(uint32_t& volume) const override;
93 int32_t MaxSpeakerVolume(uint32_t& maxVolume) const override;
94 int32_t MinSpeakerVolume(uint32_t& minVolume) const override;
95
96 // Microphone volume controls
97 int32_t MicrophoneVolumeIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
98 int32_t SetMicrophoneVolume(uint32_t volume) override;
99 int32_t MicrophoneVolume(uint32_t& volume) const override;
100 int32_t MaxMicrophoneVolume(uint32_t& maxVolume) const override;
101 int32_t MinMicrophoneVolume(uint32_t& minVolume) const override;
102
103 // Speaker mute control
104 int32_t SpeakerMuteIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
105 int32_t SetSpeakerMute(bool enable) override;
106 int32_t SpeakerMute(bool& enabled) const override;
107
108 // Microphone mute control
109 int32_t MicrophoneMuteIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
110 int32_t SetMicrophoneMute(bool enable) override;
111 int32_t MicrophoneMute(bool& enabled) const override;
112
113 // Stereo support
114 int32_t StereoPlayoutIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
115 int32_t SetStereoPlayout(bool enable) override;
116 int32_t StereoPlayout(bool& enabled) const override;
117 int32_t StereoRecordingIsAvailable(bool& available) override;
118 int32_t SetStereoRecording(bool enable) override;
119 int32_t StereoRecording(bool& enabled) const override;
120
121 // Delay information and control
122 int32_t PlayoutDelay(uint16_t& delayMS) const override;
123
124 void AttachAudioBuffer(AudioDeviceBuffer* audioBuffer) override;
125
126 private:
127 static void RecThreadFunc(void*);
128 static void PlayThreadFunc(void*);
129 bool RecThreadProcess();
130 bool PlayThreadProcess();
131
132 int32_t _playout_index;
133 int32_t _record_index;
134 AudioDeviceBuffer* _ptrAudioBuffer;
135 int8_t* _recordingBuffer; // In bytes.
136 int8_t* _playoutBuffer; // In bytes.
137 uint32_t _recordingFramesLeft;
138 uint32_t _playoutFramesLeft;
139 Mutex mutex_;
140
141 size_t _recordingBufferSizeIn10MS;
142 size_t _recordingFramesIn10MS;
143 size_t _playoutFramesIn10MS;
144
145 rtc::PlatformThread _ptrThreadRec;
146 rtc::PlatformThread _ptrThreadPlay;
147
148 bool _playing;
149 bool _recording;
150 int64_t _lastCallPlayoutMillis;
151 int64_t _lastCallRecordMillis;
152
153 FileWrapper _outputFile;
154 FileWrapper _inputFile;
155 std::string _outputFilename;
156 std::string _inputFilename;
157};
158
159} // namespace webrtc
160
161#endif // AUDIO_DEVICE_FILE_AUDIO_DEVICE_H_
162
